start.description:
The goal of the M POWER project is to better understand the experiences of men with prostate cancer. We will use the information we collect to help patients make better decisions about their prostate cancer care. Your responses will always be kept private and will be de-identified, so everything that you share will never be traceable to you.

Important Survey instructions: PLEASE READ
This survey has 6 parts: Patient Characteristics, Clinical Diagnosis, Family History of Prostate Cancer, Treatment, Quality of Life and Lifestyle. It is VERY important that when you complete all 6 sections, you go to the final page and click save/ submit. Otherwise, your information will NOT be included.

It is important that you answer questions honestly and completely. Many of the questions are very personal, but they will help us understand the important issues that you face every day. Please do not fill out any questions that make you feel uncomfortable.

Your participation is very important to us, and we believe that your experiences will help us to improve the prostate cancer experience for future generations. Thank you for contributing your time to help others with prostate cancer.
Thank you!

sections.title: Patient Characteristics
sections.description: Be sure you complete all sections before you submit!

extConfig.name: DiagnosisStatus
extConfig.fieldLabel: Have you been diagnosed with prostate cancer?

extConfig.name: BirthDate
extConfig.fieldLabel: What is your date of birth?
What is your race? Mark all that apply

items.boxLabel: Asian - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam
items.name: RaceAsian

items.boxLabel: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
items.name: RaceHawaiian

extConfig.name: RaceHispanic
extConfig.fieldLabel: Are you Hispanic or Latino?
Which group best describes your origin?
extConfig.name: hispanic_origin_radiogroup

question: RaceHispanic
HispanicOrigin
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ me.setVisible(values['RaceHispanic']); if (cmp.name == 'HispanicOrigin'){ var el = me.getComponent('hispanic_originOther'); if (el) { el.setVisible(values['HispanicOrigin'] == 4); }} }}

extConfig.name: ZipCode
extConfig.fieldLabel: What is the zip code where you currently live? Please type in the box.
When you were diagnosed, what was the highest level of education you had received?
extConfig.name: education_status_radiogroup
marital_status_radiogroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: Are you married or in a long-term relationship?

extConfig.name: employment_status_radiogroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: Are you currently employed?

change.question: EmploymentStatus
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ var el = me.getComponent('employment_statusOther'); if (el) { el.setVisible(newValue === 5); } }}

extConfig.fieldLabel: What is your current health insurance coverage?
extConfig.name: insurance_coverage_checkgroup

change.question: insurance_coverage
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ var el = me.getComponent(cmp.name + cmp.inputValue); if (el) { el.setVisible(newValue); } }}

sections.title: Clinical Diagnosis
sections.description: Be sure you complete all sections before you submit!

extConfig.name: DiagnosisDate
extConfig.fieldLabel: Approximately when were you first told that you had prostate cancer?

change.question: DiagnosisStatus
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ Ext4.QuickTips.init(); me.setVisible(values['DiagnosisStatus'] != 3); }}

extConfig.fieldLabel: This survey is for those that have been diagnosed with prostate cancer. Please return to our education pages to learn more about the disease.
extConfig.name: no_diagnosis

change.question: DiagnosisStatus
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ me.setVisible(values['DiagnosisStatus'] == 3); }}

extConfig.name: PSALevelGroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: What was your PSA (prostate-specific antigen) level when you were diagnosed?

extConfig.name: CancerExtentGroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: What was the extent of your cancer at diagnosis? (stage)

items.boxLabel: Cancer is found in the prostate only
items.name: CancerExtent

items.boxLabel: Cancer has spread outside of the prostate to local area (lymph nodes)
items.name: CancerExtent

items.boxLabel: Cancer has spread outside of the prostate to distant areas, such as bones
items.name: CancerExtent

extConfig.name: GeneticTest
extConfig.fieldLabel: Have you ever had a genetic/ genomic test on your blood or tumor?

sections.title: Treatment
sections.description: Be sure you complete all sections before you submit!

extConfig.name: treatment_status_radiogroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: Which of the following best describes the current state of your prostate cancer?

items.boxLabel: I have not made a decision about treatment yet
items.name: CurrentTreatmentState

items.boxLabel: I am on active surveillance or watchful waiting [?]
items.name: CurrentTreatmentState

items.boxLabel: I had treatment (such as surgery or radiation) for my prostate cancer and my cancer has not come back
items.name: CurrentTreatmentState

items.boxLabel: I had treatment for my prostate cancer and I am being treated because my PSA was rising
items.name: CurrentTreatmentState

items.boxLabel: My prostate cancer spread outside of the prostate to other parts of my body, which is metastatic prostate cancer
items.name: CurrentTreatmentState

extConfig.name: TreatmentWithinYear
extConfig.fieldLabel: Did you have active treatment for your prostate cancer within one year after your original diagnosis?

extConfig.name: primary_clinician_radiogroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: Who was the primary clinician for your treatment for your prostate cancer?

extConfig.name: treatment_types_checkboxgroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: What treatment(s) did you have for your prostate cancer? Select all that apply.

items.boxLabel: Cryotherapy/cryoablation (placing needles in prostate to freeze prostate)
items.name: treatment_types

items.boxLabel: Brachytherapy (placing of radioactive seeds or rods in the prostate)
items.name: treatment_types_radiation

items.boxLabel: Androgen (Hormone) Therapy [?]
items.name: treatment_types

question: treatment_types
treatment_types_surgery
treatment_types_radiation
treatment_types_medical_treatment
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ var els = Ext4.ComponentQuery.query('#' + cmp.name + cmp.inputValue.replace(/ /g, '')); if (els.length == 1){ els[0].setVisible(newValue);}}

extConfig.name: CancerSpreadBeyondProstate
extConfig.fieldLabel: Has your prostate cancer spread outside of the prostate?
Where has it spread to? Please mark all that apply
extConfig.name: prostate_spread_location_radiogroup

question: CancerSpreadBeyondProstate
SpreadToOrgans
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ console.log(values); if (me){ me.setVisible(values['CancerSpreadBeyondProstate']); if (cmp.name == 'SpreadToOrgans'){ var el = me.getComponent('prostate_spread_locationOther'); if (el) { el.setVisible(values['SpreadToOrgans']); }} }}

extConfig.name: TreatmentSatisfaction
extConfig.fieldLabel: Overall, how satisfied are you with the treatment(s) you received for your prostate cancer?

sections.title: Quality of Life
sections.description: Be sure you complete all sections before you submit!

extConfig.name: FourWeekFrequencyUrineLeaking
extConfig.fieldLabel: Over the past 4 weeks, how often have you leaked urine?

extConfig.name: FourWeekUrineControl
extConfig.fieldLabel: Which of the following best describes your urinary control during the last 4 weeks?

extConfig.name: FourWeekDiaperUse
extConfig.fieldLabel: How many pads or adult diapers per day did you usually use to control leakage during the last 4 weeks?
How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you during the last 4 weeks?

items.name: FourWeekProblemUrinationWeakStream
items.fieldLabel: Weak urine stream or incomplete emptying

items.name: FourWeekProblemUrinationFrequently
items.fieldLabel: Need to urinate frequently during the day

extConfig.name: FourWeekProblemUrinationOverall
extConfig.fieldLabel: Overall, how big a problem has your urinary function been for you during the last 4 weeks?
How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you?

items.name: ProblemBowelUrgency
items.fieldLabel: Urgency to have a bowel movement

extConfig.name: FourWeekProblemBowel
extConfig.fieldLabel: Overall, how big a problem have your bowel habits been for you during the last 4 weeks?
How would you rate each of the following during the last 4 weeks?

items.name: FourWeekAbilityErection
items.fieldLabel: Your ability to have an erection

extConfig.name: FourWeekQualityErection
extConfig.fieldLabel: How would you describe the usual QUALITY of your erections during the last 4 weeks?

extConfig.name: FourWeekFrequencyErection
extConfig.fieldLabel: How would you describe the FREQUENCY of your erections during the last 4 weeks?

extConfig.name: FourWeekSexualFunction
extConfig.fieldLabel: Overall, how would you rate your ability to function sexually during the last 4 weeks?

extConfig.name: FourWeekSexualProblem
extConfig.fieldLabel: Overall, how big a problem has your sexual function or lack of sexual function been for you during the last 4 weeks?
How big a problem during the last 4 weeks, if any, has each of the following been for you?

sections.title: Lifestyle
sections.description: Be sure you complete all sections before you submit!

extConfig.name: prior_health_conditions_checkboxgroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: Did you have any other health conditions before or during your prostate cancer diagnosis?

items.boxLabel: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), acquired respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS), or emphysema
items.name: prior_health_conditions

items.boxLabel: Neurological disease (such as multiple sclerosis or Parkinson's)
items.name: prior_health_conditions

items.boxLabel: Visual impairment (such as cataracts, glaucoma, macular degeneration)
items.name: prior_health_conditions

items.boxLabel: Hearing impairment (very hard of hearing, even with hearing aids)
items.name: prior_health_conditions

items.boxLabel: Degenerative disc disease (back disease, spinal stenosis, or severe chronic back pain)
items.name: prior_health_conditions

items.boxLabel: Obesity and/or body mass index of 30 and above. Check here.
items.name: prior_health_conditions

question: prior_health_conditions_other_note
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (cmp.name == 'prior_health_conditions_other_note'){ var el = me.getComponent(cmp.name + cmp.inputValue); if (el) { el.setVisible(newValue); } }}

question: prior_health_conditions_cancer
prior_health_cancer_tumor_note
prior_health_cancer_other_note
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ var vals = values['prior_health_conditions_cancer']; me.setVisible(vals && (vals == 'Cancer' || vals.indexOf('Cancer') > -1)); } if (cmp.name == 'prior_health_cancer_tumor_note' || cmp.name == 'prior_health_cancer_other_note'){ var el = me.getComponent(cmp.name + cmp.inputValue); if (el) { el.setVisible(newValue); } }}

extConfig.name: complementary_treatments_checkboxgroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: Did you use any complementary or alternative medicine treatments since you were diagnosed with prostate cancer? Select any that apply

items.boxLabel: Special diets such as low fat or mostly vegetarian diet
items.name: AlternateTherapySpecialDiet

items.boxLabel: Herbs or dietary supplements (such as saw palmetto, lycopene, supplements or selenium)
items.name: AlternateTherapyDietSupplement

items.boxLabel: High dose vitamins or mega vitamins (such as vitamin E), DO NOT include 1-a-day multivitamins
items.name: AlternateTherapyVitamin

items.boxLabel: Movement or physical therapies such as yoga, tai chi, massage, chiropractic therapy
items.name: AlternateTherapyPhysical

items.boxLabel: Oriental therapies such as acupuncture, acupressure Qigong, or Shiatsu
items.name: AlternateTherapyOriental

items.boxLabel: Faith healing, laying on of hands, or any other spiritual or religious group experience
items.name: AlternateTherapyFaith

items.boxLabel: Mind/body therapies such as guided imagery/visualization, biofeedback, meditation, relaxation techniques, hypnosis/hypnotherapy, energy healing, therapeutic touch, or music therapy
items.name: AlternateTherapyMind

items.boxLabel: Did not use any of these types of therapies
items.name: AlternateTherapyNone

change.question: complementary_treatments
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ var el = me.getComponent('complementary_treatmentsOther'); if (el) { el.setVisible(newValue); } }}

extConfig.name: Cigarettes
extConfig.fieldLabel: Do you smoke cigarettes?

extConfig.name: CigarettesPerDayBeforeDiagnosis
extConfig.fieldLabel: Approximately how many cigarettes did you smoke per day before you were diagnosed with prostate cancer?

change.question: Cigarettes
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ me.setVisible(values['Cigarettes']); }}

extConfig.name: CigarettesPerDayCurrently
extConfig.fieldLabel: Approximately how many cigarettes per day do you currently smoke?

change.question: Cigarettes
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ me.setVisible(values['Cigarettes']); }}

extConfig.name: YearsOfCigaretteUse
extConfig.fieldLabel: In total, how many years have you smoked at least 1 cigarette a day for a least a year? (Do not include periods when you did not smoke)

change.question: Cigarettes
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ me.setVisible(values['Cigarettes']); }}

extConfig.name: Alcohol
extConfig.fieldLabel: Do you drink alcohol?

extConfig.name: AlcoholPerDayBeforeDiagnosis
extConfig.fieldLabel: Approximately how many alcoholic beverages did you drink per week before you were diagnosed with prostate cancer?

change.question: Alcohol
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ me.setVisible(values['Alcohol']); }}

extConfig.name: AlcoholPerDayCurrently
extConfig.fieldLabel: Approximately how many alcoholic beverages do you currently drink per week?

change.question: Alcohol
change.fn: function(me, cmp, newValue, oldValue, values){ if (me){ me.setVisible(values['Alcohol']); }}

extConfig.fieldLabel: What is your current height?

extConfig.name: Weight
extConfig.fieldLabel: What is your current weight (pounds)?

extConfig.name: FourWeekDaysOfExercise
extConfig.fieldLabel: On average, over the past 4 weeks, on how many days a week do you usually exercise enough to work up a sweat (include brisk walking or more strenuous activity)?

extConfig.name: AttendedProstateSupportGroup
extConfig.fieldLabel: Have you ever attended a prostate support group?

extConfig.name: ProstateCancerExperience
extConfig.fieldLabel: Is there anything else you want to tell us about your prostate cancer experience?
